Package PegSolitaireGame

Interface PegSolitaire

All Known Implementing Classes:
PegSolitaireEngine
public interface PegSolitaire
The main interface of the PegSolitaire game, has the Subclass PegSolitaireEngine.
See Also:
  • PegSolitaireExc
  • PegSolitaireEngine
  • PegSolitaireGUI

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    PegSolitaire.Action
    The interface of the class that holds the information about an action.
    static interface 
    PegSolitaire.CellState
    The interface of the enum type that describes what states can a cell be in.
    static interface 
    PegSolitaire.Direction
    The interface of the enum type that describes in what direction is an action targeted to.

      void playAuto()

    • movePeg

      void movePeg(PegSolitaire.Action action) throws PegSolitaireExc.InvalidActionException
      Perform the given action on the board. Uses checkAction() to validate the action. Records the last performed action.
      Parameters:
      action -
      Throws:
      PegSolitaireExc.InvalidActionException - If the given action was not valid
